item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
Code Generation

The easiest way to start your REST API project is from OpenAPI specification and here is a video to show you how to generate a project from swagger spec.

light-java-getting-started

Start from one of the example project

You can find many example project at a separate repo light-java-example and start by copying one of them.

Building microservices?

Follow the microservices tutorial to build multiple services that communicate each other.
